directions: Place onion, olive oil, and garlic in a slow cooker. Arrange pork over onion mixture and add ale. Season with black pepper.
Cook on Low for 6 to 8 hours. Drain and discard liquid from slow cooker. Shred pork with 2 forks and add barbeque sauce and liquid smoke.
Continue to cook on Low for 2 more hours.
ingredients: 1 (12 fluid ounce) can brown ale (such as Newcastle® Brown Ale)
title: Newcastle® BBQ Pulled Pork
